system.description:
Art District Hub Move

When you posture for clout in front of well-connected NPCs, roll with Mind.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: Your humblebragging attracts attention of a rival you owe a Debt; take -1 ongoing when refusing to honor Debts to their Circle until time passes.

weakHit.label: Weak Hit
weakHit.value: They buy your ruse; take +1 Status with relevant Circle until time passes or deception revealed. However, they require you to prove yourself or risk retribution.

strongHit.label: Strong Hit
strongHit.value: They buy your ruse; take +1 Status with relevant Circle until time passes or deception revealed.
